<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/timer">Timer</a></>}>
This class is used to track the amount of time spent between invocations of its <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/timer/#aa8c887576ec3b0d68c10ebf4097c367c">startTimer()</a>/stopTimer() methods. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/timer/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/timeregion">TimeRegion</a></>}>
The <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/timeregion">TimeRegion</a> class is used as a helper class to call the startTimer() and stopTimer() methods of the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/timer">Timer</a> class. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/timeregion/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/namedregiontimer">NamedRegionTimer</a></>}>
This class is basically a combination of <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/timeregion">TimeRegion</a> and <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/timer">Timer</a>. <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/namedregiontimer/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/timergroup">TimerGroup</a></>}>
The <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/timergroup">TimerGroup</a> class is used to group together related timers into a single report that is printed when the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/timergroup">TimerGroup</a> is destroyed. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/timergroup/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/timergroup/printrecord">PrintRecord</a></>}>

<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This class is used to track the amount of time spent between invocations of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// its startTimer()/stopTimer() methods.  Given appropriate OS support it can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// also keep track of the RSS of the program at various points.  By default,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the Timer will print the amount of time it has captured to standard error</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// when the last timer is destroyed, otherwise it is printed when its</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// TimerGroup is destroyed.  Timers do not print their information if they are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// never started.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/timer"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/timer/#aa625638779b64a2d67808371d6b37e4c">Timer</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The TimeRegion class is used as a helper class to call the startTimer() and</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This class is basically a combination of TimeRegion and Timer.  It allows</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// you to declare a new timer, AND specify the region to time, all in one</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// statement.  All timers with the same name are merged.  This is primarily</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// used for debugging and for hunting performance problems.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/namedregiontimer"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/namedregiontimer/#a49aea1d2b11c5daa73a6581fbaed6508">NamedRegionTimer</a> : </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TimeRegion &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The TimerGroup class is used to group together related timers into a single</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// report that is printed when the TimerGroup is destroyed.  It is illegal to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// destroy a TimerGroup object before all of the Timers in it are gone.  A</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/timergroup"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight">TimerGroup &#123;</span></CodeLine>
